com.google.android.glass.TMM

Class AudioPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.google.android.glass.TMM.AudioPlayer

  • public class AudioPlayer
extends Activity
    The Class AudioPlayer. This class is the Android Activity responsible for handling the content in AudioCard objects, most often by playing the audio file contain information the user wants to hear.

      The control thread for the progress bar.

    • Field Detail

      • TAG

        public static final java.lang.String TAG
        The Constant TAG. Used for the Android debug logger.

      • mGestureDetector

        private GestureDetector mGestureDetector
        The GestureDetector that handles user input while this activity is running.

      • ALPHA_VALUE

        private final float ALPHA_VALUE
        Controls the dimness of the backgrounds on the cards.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_SELECTED_POS

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_SELECTED_POS
        The Constant EXTRA_SELECTED_POS. This is used for intent extra passing. Designed to map to the position of the selected card from the SelectCardActivity so that when the user returns to it, the card they just tapped on is in focus.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_SELECTED_ID

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_SELECTED_ID
        The Constant EXTRA_SELECTED_ID. This is used for intent extra passing. This maps to the String UUID of the card so that each activity my access it from the DB directly
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_PLAYER_POS

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_PLAYER_POS
        The Constant EXTRA_PLAYER_POS. This is used for intent extra passing. Designed to map to the last position of the player within the file, so that it can be resumed properly.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_LAST_PLAYER_POS

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_LAST_PLAYER_POS
        The Constant EXTRA_LAST_PLAYER_POS. This is used for intent extra passing. This maps to the last known progress of the player through the audio clip, can be used to restart the player in a specific state.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TIME_TO_SEEK

        public static final int TIME_TO_SEEK
        The Constant TIME_TO_SEEK. When the user scrolls either forwards or backwards, each scroll advances the player position by this many ms.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • KEY_SWIPE_DOWN

        private static final int KEY_SWIPE_DOWN
        The Constant KEY_SWIPE_DOWN. Used to handle the backwards compatibility for the swipe down action used to dismiss views in glass.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_POS

        private static final int DEFAULT_POS
        The Constant DEFAULT_POS. Used to obtain a numeric position of the player within the audio file, in the event that one cannot be obtained from the intent
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • cardPos

        private int cardPos
        The position of the card within the cardscroll view from which the user launched this audioplayer activity.

        The UUID of the audio card which is serving as the source for this audio player activity.

      • mediaPlayer

        MediaPlayer mediaPlayer
        The media player object. This is used to open and play the audio file specified by the card used to launch this activity.

      • progUpdater

        java.lang.Thread progUpdater
        The progress updater thread. This keeps the progress bar at the top of the screen shwoing .

      • lastPos

        int lastPos
        The position of the player within the audio file when the intent was launched.

      • broadcastReceiver

        private BroadcastReceiver broadcastReceiver
        The broadcast receiver that kills the audio player gracefully. Used in the audio menu when the user wants to return to the select cards view
